explains: n. 告发，检举；公开谴责，斥责

sentences.en: All parties joined in bitter denunciation of the terrorists.
sentences.cn: 所有党派同仇敌忾地痛斥恐怖主义者。

sentences.en: On September 24, he wrote a stinging denunciation of his critics.
sentences.cn: 9月24号，他写了一篇针对他的批评者的言辞犀利的谴责书。

sentences.en: His speech is a head-on denunciation of the unpopular new policy.
sentences.cn: 他的发言是对不得人心的新政策的迎头痛斥。
